subcodes.description: No active sub code
Subcode of error DC_Undervoltage_Error. The BMS is reporting an under voltage error, the voltage of the battery is below its minimum threshold
Subcode of error DC_Undervoltage_Error. The controller detected that the DC bus voltage is below its internal hardware threshold
Subcode of error DC_Undervoltage_Error. The controller detected that the DC bus voltage is below the configured undervoltage threshold of the battery (scenario where BMS communication is not enabled)
Subcode of error DC_Overvoltage_Error. The BMS is reporting an over voltage error, the voltage of the battery is above its maximum threshold
Subcode of error DC_Overvoltage_Error. The controller detected that the DC bus voltage is above its internal hardware threshold
Subcode of error DC_Overvoltage_Error. The controller detected that the DC bus voltage is above the configured overvoltage threshold of the battery (scenario where BMS communication is not enabled)
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an over temperature error, the current battery temperature is above the battery specific threshold
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an under temperature error, the current battery temperature is below the battery specific threshold
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an charging over current error, the current delivered to the battery is above the supported battery threshold
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an discharge over current error, the current drained from the battery is above the supported battery threshold
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an short circuit error
Subcode of Battery_Error. Battery is reporting an internal error
Subcode of Controller_Overcurrent_Warning. Over current error triggered by OCD2 error
Subcode of Controller_Overcurrent_Warning. Over current error triggered by OCD2 fault
Subcode of Controller_Overcurrent_Warning. Over current error triggered by OCSP error
Subcode of error Controller_Overcurrent_Warning. Over current error triggered by OCD1 error
Subcode of error Motor_Malfunction_Warning. Motor power delivery temporarily stopped - the motor was detected as being stuck
Subcode of error Motor_Malfunction_Warning. Limited current protection is active due to previous stuck conditions detected
Subcode of error Controller_Anomaly_Error. Invalid FOC duration
Subcode of error Controller_Anomaly_Error. A software error was triggered
Subcode of error Controller_Anomaly_Error. Motor is active with a zero torque reference (note: this subcode will be deprecated)
